trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Scranton
There were no other sightings in Scranton on or around November 8th 2009
Summary: Bright non-blinking light moving fast then turning red and vanishing
divs: Sighting DetailsMy girlfriend and I were looking at the night sky at what we thought was a ufo, but it was just a planet. Then this bright light came flying across the sky it was not blinking and moving at a good rate, it stayed in our view for a few min until it turned red and vanished almost instantly into thin air, not a cloud in sight!
